```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r}
hp_characters <- read_delim(here("harry_potter_characters.csv"), delim = ';', na = '')

names(hp_characters)

unique(hp_characters$Wand)

hp_characters <- janitor::clean_names(hp_characters)

wands <- hp_characters %>%
  select(name, wand) %>%
  filter(wand != "Unknown") %>% 
  separate(wand, into = c("wand_length", "wand_type"), sep = '"') %>% 
  filter(wand_type != "NA") %>% 
  mutate(wand_length = as.numeric(wand_length))
  

wands_plot <- ggplot(wands, aes(x = name, y = wand)) +
  geom_col()

wands_plot

```
